resources.string: Welcome to the HvA Location Quest

After pressing start you will start the quest. After each question a picture of a HvA building is shown. Go to the building and start the next question. At the end there will be a prize waiting for you!
Go to the location shown in the image below.
Congratulations, you finished the quest! Here is your prize!
You are about to navigate back. Do you want to stop the quiz or navigate to the previous question?
